meanings.definition: The state of being worn or used.
meanings.sent1: The old shoes showed signs of wornnesses after years of use.
meanings.sent2: The fabric's wornnesses indicated its long history of being worn.
meanings.sent3: The wornnesses of the teddy bear made it look well-loved and cuddly.
meanings.sent4: The town's wornnesses gave it a sense of history and character.
meanings.sent5: The wornnesses of the path told stories of many footsteps taken.

meanings.definition: The quality of being worn out or exhausted.
meanings.sent1: After the long hike, the wornnesses in his legs were evident.
meanings.sent2: The tiredness and wornnesses in her voice showed she needed rest.
meanings.sent3: The wornnesses in the car's engine made it sputter and cough.
meanings.sent4: The wornnesses of the old book added charm to its pages.
meanings.sent5: The wornnesses of the marathon runner were visible in every step.
